mapper.select: SELECT MU.USER_NO , MU.USER_NAME , MU.LOGIN_TYPE , MU.NICK_NAME , MU.PHONE , MI.PROFILE_IMG_NO , MI.PROFILE_IMG_NAME , MI.ATTACHED_PROFILE_IMG_NAME FROM MEMBER_USER MU LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMG MI ON MU.USER_NO = MI.USER_NO WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName} AND PASSWORD = #{passWord}

SELECT MU.USER_NO , MU.USER_NAME , MU.LOGIN_TYPE , MU.NICK_NAME , MU.PHONE , MI.PROFILE_IMG_NO , MI.PROFILE_IMG_NAME , MI.ATTACHED_PROFILE_IMG_NAME FROM MEMBER_USER MU LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMG MI ON MU.USER_NO = MI.USER_NO WHERE MU.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT MI.USER_NO , PROFILE_IMG_NO , PROFILE_IMG_NAME , ATTACHED_PROFILE_IMG_NAME FROM MEMBER_USER MU JOIN MEMBER_IMG MI ON MU.USER_NO = MI.USER_NO
SELECT ALARM_CODE , USER_NO , AUTHORITY_UPDATE FROM ALARM WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO ALARM USING DUAL ON (USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET AUTHORITY_UPDATE = 2 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ALARM_CODE , USER_NO , AUTHORITY_UPDATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT 'ALARM_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ALARM_CODE, 7))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') ALARM_CODE FROM ALARM) , #{userNo} , #{authorityUpdate} )
mapper.select: SELECT REALTOR_CODE , TO_USER_NO , INQUIRY_CODE , INQUIRY_ANSWER FROM INQUIRY I , REALTOR_DETAIL R WHERE TO_USER_NO = #{toUserNo} AND I.TO_USER_NO = R.USER_NO

SELECT INQUIRY_CODE , ROOM_CODE , TO_USER_NO , FROM_USER_NO , I.INQUIRY_TITLE_CODE , INQUIRY_TITLES , INQUIRY_ANSWER , TO_CHAR(INQUIRY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') INQUIRY_DATE , INQUIRY_ST_CODE FROM INQUIRY I, INQUIRY_TITLE T WHERE FROM_USER_NO = #{userNo} AND I.INQUIRY_TITLE_CODE = T.INQUIRY_TITLE_CODE ORDER BY INQUIRY_DATE DESC
